npcs.name: Elder Thalric
npcs.description: The village elder, wise but secretive. He seems to know more than he lets on.
npcs.personality: Wise, cautious, and somewhat mysterious. He speaks in riddles and often seems to be testing the player.

npcs.name: Gorrik Ironfist
npcs.description: A gruff but skilled dwarven blacksmith who runs the local forge.
npcs.personality: Stoic, hardworking, and values craftsmanship above all else.
goals: Create the finest weapons in the land
Pass on his knowledge to a worthy apprentice
Find rare materials for his craft
fears: His work being stolen or copied
secrets: He has a hidden stash of rare metals
He once forged weapons for the dark lord

npcs.name: Mara Silverleaf
npcs.description: A cheerful half-elf who runs the local inn.
npcs.personality: Friendly, observant, and always ready with a story or advice.
goals: Make her inn the most welcoming place in town
Learn more about her elven heritage
fears: Her past catching up with her
secrets: She's on the run from her noble family
She has a magical amulet that helps her see the truth

npcs.name: Captain Roderick
npcs.description: The village's head guard, a stern but fair human who takes his duty seriously.
npcs.personality: Disciplined, loyal, and protective. He follows the rules but knows when to bend them.
secrets: He has a soft spot for children
He's secretly in love with the innkeeper
